src_original: vandhyāsutādīnāmasattvāt kathaṃ sattāyogaḥ? iti cet / na /  itaretarāśrayāt /  yatasteṣāmasattvaṃ sattāyogavirahādeva tadvirahaścāsattvāditi /  yadi ca satāmeva sattāyogaḥ evaṃ tarhyanyat sattvalakṣaṇamabhidhānīyam sattāyogasya ca vaiyarthyam,  tat eva vastunaḥ sattvāt /
tgt_original: yadi nāmārthakriyā sā na yuktā tatkimityasattvamevāsya syādityāha |

src_original: sarvārthakriyāsāmarthyavirahāt sattāyogābhāvasteṣāmiti (Hbṭ 146) cet /  evaṃ sati yadevārthakriyasāmarthyayuktaṃ tasyaiva sattāyoga ityarthakriyāsāmarthyameva bhāvalakṣaṇamāyātamityapārthakaḥ /  sattāyogaḥ /
tgt_original: arthakriyetyādi |  arthakriyāyāḥ sāmarthyantadeva lakṣaṇaṃ yasya sattvasyeti vigrahaḥ |  ato'rthakriyāsāmarthyalakṣaṇātsattvādvyāvṛttamvyavacchinnaṃ |

src_original: anyathā sāmānyādīnāṃ kathaṃ svarūpaṃ sattvaṃ syāt? /  arthakriyāsāmarthyaṃ tu sarveṣāmastīti tadeva bhāvalakṣaṇam /
tgt_original: ) kathampunaridamavasīyate ( |  ) arthakriyāsāmarthaṃ sattvalakṣaṇamityata āha |  sarvvetyādi |  sarvveṣāṃ sāmarthyānāmupākhyā śrutiḥ |

src_original: tato 'nyasya bhāvalakṣaṇasyāyogāt śakteścāntaśaḥ svajñānajanane 'pyupagamāt paraiḥ,  anyathā ṣaṭpadārthādivyavasthānāyogāt saiva bhāvalakṣaṇam,  sarvaśaktivirahaḥ punarabhāvalakṣaṇam /  sarvagrahaṇaṃ ca sarvasya vastuno vastvantaraśaktiviraharūpatvādabhāvatānirāsārtham /
tgt_original: sarvvagrahaṇaṃ ghaṭādīnāmapi kṣāṇikattvenābhimatānāmviṣayabhedenārthakriyāsāmarthya nivṛtterastīti teṣāmasattvavyavacchedāya |  naivārthakriyāsāmarthyaṃ sattvalakṣaṇamapi tu sattāyoga iti cet |
